S. Korean Religious Organizations against FTA 
   Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The Missionary Solidarity Council of Christian Society and 14 other religious organizations in south Korea reportedly called a news conference in front of the Jangchung Church in Seoul on July 13 and voiced their opposition to the signing of the south Korea-U.S. Free Trade Agreement.
 Terming the conclusion of the FTA downright treachery to the nation, they strongly demanded the "government" immediately halt FTA negotiations.

Greetings to Uzbek FM
   Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, foreign minister of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Vladimir Norov upon his appointment as Uzbek foreign minister.
 In the belief that the ties of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, too, the message sincerely wished him great success in his new job.
